original_text: Anyway, I need to continue my journey for some more days. If they want to kill a prophet from God, it has to happen in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그러나 오늘과 내일과 모레는 내가 갈 길을 가야 하리니 선지자가 예루살렘 밖에서는 죽는 법이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Anyway, I need to continue my journey
If they want to kill a prophet from God,
it has to happen in Jerusalem.
